## Description
The **Deliver Emails **task allows to send emails.

> Note

For more information on the structure of the input file, see: [XML Input File Structure for Doxee Platform 3 Native Tasks](/doxee-platform/docs/xml-input-file-structure-for-doxee-platform-3-native-tasks), section "Email delivery".

## Configuration
**![](data:image/png;base64,)**

- In the **Alias **field, enter the name of the task that will be displayed in the workflow.

- *(optional) *Enable the **Use LOTXML **option to enable sending emails using a LOTXML file.

> Note

The delivery channel option file (usually referred to as LOTXML) is an XML file produced by a DC task that contains metadata information describing the materials to be delivered.

For more information on the legacy DP2 Multichannel Distribution LOTXML specification, see:

[MD Delivery Channel Option File (LOTXML) Specification](https://code.doxee.com/confluence/display/DD/MD%2BDelivery%2BChannel%2BOption%2BFile%2B%28LOTXML%29%2BSpecification)

[LOTXML Email Gateway](https://code.doxee.com/confluence/display/DD/LOTXML%2BEmail%2BGateway)

- Click on the **Resource **field and select the Email Template resource to use.

> Note

For more information, see: [Email Template Resource Reference](/doxee-platform/docs/email-template-resource-reference).

> Note

If you enable the **LOTXML** option, the **Resource** selection field is hidden.

> **Header validation**

If the tasks detects a **x-header **without a **Key**, the communication is discarded.

If the tasks detects a **x-header **with a **Key **but without a **Value**, the communication is sent but the malformed header is ignored.
